item.description: Cape Cod Canal Walk- This is a 13.5 mile stretch of paved off-road walkway that runs alongside the Cape Cod Canal. It's breathtaking in it's beauty. Walkers can enjoy beautiful sea breezes and watch the ships and boat traffic travel through the canal. There are park benches scattered along the canal on both sides at regular intervals. We will take in lunch after the walk for those interested at a local seafood restaurant. Carpooling will be available so please indicate if you need a ride or will provide rides for those needing one. We'll meet at 9:00 am at a convenient spot in the Boston area and proceed from there. It should take approximately 1 hour to drive there.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: CAPE COD CANAL WALK
